title: World Away
lyrics:
You're just a world
Only the world away
It all rolls into one and I will fade away
This universe where I've been doomed to lay
Empty, it goes to waste
Falling on every sword



I'm not ready to let go

It's too painful

Time, it moves so slow

How the story goes

I follow you, yes, blindly

You take it all so lightly

I'm [?] by



(I'm not ready)

I'm not ready to let go

It's too painful
